name: @inovua/reactdatagrid
author: Inovua Trading S.R.L. <contact@reactdatagrid.io>
description: Empower Your Data with the best React Data Grid there is

scripts.lib:style: npx mkdirp lib/community-edition && npx mkdirp lib/enterprise-edition && node ./scripts/lib-style.js && npm run lib:postcss && cp lib/community-edition/index.css lib/enterprise-edition && cp lib/community-edition/base.css lib/enterprise-edition && cp -R lib/community-edition/theme lib/enterprise-edition
scripts.copy-files: cp package.json lib/community-edition && cp package.json lib/enterprise-edition && cp ./community-edition/README.md ./lib/community-edition && cp ./enterprise-edition/README.md ./lib/enterprise-edition && cp ./community-edition/LICENSE.md ./lib/community-edition && cp ./enterprise-edition/LICENSE.md ./lib/enterprise-edition && cp .npmignore ./lib/community-edition && cp .npmignore ./lib/enterprise-edition
scripts.babel: npm run babel:community && npm run babel:enterprise
scripts.build: npm run doctoc && (npm run tsc || true) && rimraf lib && npm run lib:style && npm run babel && npm run copy-files && npm run build:package && npm run tsc-gen-declarations && npm run inject-license-header
scripts.build:package: npm run build:package:community && npm run build:package:enterprise
scripts.pretty: npm run pretty:community && npm run pretty:enterprise
scripts.prettystyle: npm run prettystyle:community && npm run prettystyle:enterprise
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run patch && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:canary: npm run build && npm run nobump:canary
scripts.release:patch:canary: npm run build && npm run patch:canary
scripts.release:patch:canary:nobuild: release patch pre canary && npm run registry-publish:canary
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run minor && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:minor:canary:nobuild: release minor pre canary && npm run registry-publish:canary
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run major && npm run registry-publish
scripts.minor:canary: npm version preminor --preid=canary && npm run registry-publish:canary
scripts.patch:canary: npm version prepatch --preid=canary && npm run registry-publish:canary
scripts.nobump:canary: npm version prerelease --preid=canary && npm run registry-publish:canary
scripts.minor:beta: npm version preminor --preid=beta && npm run registry-publish:beta
scripts.patch:beta: npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm run registry-publish:beta
scripts.nobump:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run registry-publish:beta
scripts.registry-publish: npm run doctoc && npm run build:package && npm publish --access public lib/community-edition && npm publish --access public lib/enterprise-edition && npm run update-timestamp
scripts.registry-publish:canary: npm run doctoc && npm run build:package && npm publish --access public --tag canary lib/community-edition && npm publish --access public --tag canary lib/enterprise-edition
scripts.registry-publish:beta: npm run doctoc && npm run build:package && npm publish --access public --tag beta lib/community-edition && npm publish --access public --tag beta lib/enterprise-edition
scripts.doctoc: npx doctoc README.md CONTRIBUTING.md community-edition/README.md enterprise-edition/README.md enterprise-edition/LICENSE.md
